thing-type.label: PAT05 AIR QUALITY MULTI SENSOR
thing-type.description: AIR QUALITY MULTI SENSOR<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe PAT05 multi-sensor is a device that allows you to check the air quality in your home, as well as detect temperature and humidity.</p&gt <p&gtThe PAT05 Multi-sensor is easy to use and very convenient for your home. Just set the sensor on the wall of the rooms you would like to control, and you are ready to go.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Have Z-WaveTM Controller entered inclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gt2. Pressing tamper key three times within 2 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gt3. After add successful, the device will wake to receive the setting command from Z-WaveTM Controller about 20 seconds.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Have Z-WaveTM Controller entered exclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gt2. Pressing tamper key three times within 2 seconds to enter the exclusion mode.</p&gt <p&gtNode ID has been excluded.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: CO2 Threshold line 1
parameter.description: eCO2 difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppm.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off eCO2 detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: CO2 Threshold line 2
parameter.description: eCO2 difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppm.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off eCO2 detected function.</p&gt </p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: eCO2 Threshold line 3
parameter.description: eCO2 difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppm.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off eCO2 detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: eCO2 Threshold line 4
parameter.description: eCO2 difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppm.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off eCO2 detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: eCO2 Threshold line 5
parameter.description: eCO2 difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppm.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off eCO2 detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: TVOC Threshold line 1
parameter.description: TVOC difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppb.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off TVOC detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: TVOC Threshold line 2
parameter.description: TVOC difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppb.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off TVOC detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: TVOC Threshold line 3
parameter.description: TVOC difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppb.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off TVOC detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: TVOC Threshold line 4
parameter.description: TVOC difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppb.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off TVOC detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: TVOC Threshold line 5
parameter.description: TVOC difference return<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Unit is 100ppb.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off TVOC detected function.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Customer Function
parameter.description: Customer function switch, using bit control.

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: ECO2 Auto Report Time
parameter.description: The interval time for auto report the eCO2.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 means turn off auto report eCO2.</p&gt <p&gtThe default value is 1.</p&gt <p&gtThe tick time can setting by the configuration No.16</p&gt </p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: TVOC Auto Report Time
parameter.description: The interval time for auto report the TVOC.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 means turn off auto report TVOC.</p&gt <p&gtThe default value is 1.</p&gt <p&gtThe tick time can setting by the configuration No.16.</p&gt </p&gt

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: Auto Report Tick Interval
parameter.description: The interval time for auto report each tick.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSetting this configuration will effect configuration No.14 and No.15.</p&gt <p&gtThe unit is 1 minute.</p&gt <p&gtCaution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function. <br /&gtCaution2: The value is unsigned byte, the range is from 0x00 ~ 0xFF.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: CO2 Differential percent Report
parameter.description: The eCO2 Differential to report.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 means turn off this function.</p&gt <p&gtThe unit is percentage.<br /&gtEnable this function the device will detect every percentage.<br /&gtAnd when the CO2 Sensor is over 10 percentage, it will continue report.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: TVOC Differential percent Report
parameter.description: The TVOC Differential to report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 means turn off this function.</p&gt <p&gtThe unit is percentage.</p&gt <p&gtEnable this function the device will detect every percentage.</p&gt <p&gtAnd when the TVOC Sensor is over 10 percentage, it will continue report.</p&gt</p&gt
